title: Will Trump's new echo chamber matter?
description:
Former President Trump finally made good on his promise to set up his own social network to rival Twitter. So how has that been going? Makena Kelly, policy reporter for The Verge (@kellymakena), fills us in.

Read Makena’s story: https://www.theverge.com/2022/2/23/22947756/truth-social-donald-trump-facebook-twitter-talk-radio-rush-limbaugh

Today’s episode was produced and engineered by Jon Ehrens, and hosted by Adam Clark Estes.
